John Arrowwood wrote:

>
>Or change it with every generation...  Really mix those poor buggers up!  :)
>
>  
>
We could call it the moving goalposts technique :)

>But would it still evolve anywhere if you did that?
>  
>
I suppose it depends how similar each landscape is. You could make very 
slight changes and migrate to a completely different landscape over 
time. Hold on a minute, that's what incremental evolution is about. I 
already implemented that in the prey capture experiment! So it's 
actually the same thing as incremental evolution, but were talking about 
two ends of the spectrum - lots of little changes versus a few big changes.

Colin.
